import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.scss'], }) export class LoginComponent { protected userCredintiels: { userEmail: String; userPassword: String } = { userEmail: '', userPassword: '', }; test(value:any){ console.log(value) } }
